name: ng-hal-parent
description: A navigator for Hypermedia Abstraction Language (HAL) documents in Angular
author: David Herges <david@spektrakel.de>

scripts.build: yarn run build:lib && yarn run build:demo
scripts.build:demo: cd demo && yarn install && yarn run build
scripts.build:lib: cd lib && yarn install && yarn run build
scripts.ci: yarn run build:lib && yarn run test:lib
scripts.test:lib: cd lib && yarn install && yarn run build && yarn test
